subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Kim Clijsters set up an all-Belgian final against the seven-time Grand Slam winner Justine Henin with a victory over Andrea Petkovic on Friday at the Brisbane International.
snippet: Top-seeded Kim Clijsters set up an all-Belgian final against the seven-time Grand Slam winner Justine Henin with a victory over Andrea Petkovic on Friday at the Brisbane International.
